BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20085050 HKM (N 080068 HKM), pursuant to §3020 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning the designation (List No.395, LP-2237) by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of Highbridge Play Center, Council District no 10.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the landmarks preservation commission to issue notice to the department of buildings when a property is under consideration for designation as a landmark, requiring the department of buildings to issue notice to the landmarks preservation commission when permit applications for buildings under consideration for designation as a landmark are received, and revoking permits previously issued by the department of buildings when a property is designated as a landmark.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the landmarks preservation commission to issue notice to the department of buildings when a property is under consideration for designation as a landmark.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20085013 HKQ (N 080005 HKQ), pursuant to §3020 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning the designation (List No.389, LP-2155-A) by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Sunnyside Gardens Historic District as a historic district, Council District no. 26.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the landmarks preservation commission to issue notice to the department of buildings when a property is under consideration for designation as a landmark, requiring the department of buildings to issue notice to the landmarks preservation commission when permit applications for buildings under consideration for designation as a landmark are received, and revoking permits previously issued by the department of buildings when a property is designated as a landmark.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Subcommittee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the landmarks preservation commission to issue notice to the department of buildings when a property is under consideration for designation as a landmark.
